page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT - STRANRAER
page.content: The majority of jobs in Stranraer are found in the{public service sectors, e.g. shop assistants, teaching, bank staff, government offices, etc. Other areas of employment in the town are at the{harbour}e.g Sealink ferries and British Rail.{Industrial estate e.g. Baby Deer, Top Tek, Ladybird and Sunchild factories. { Farming}provides another important source of jobs, in particular, the {Galloway Creamery.}Many people travel outwith the Domesday area daily to work, e.g. to the nearby airbase of West Freugh. { Labour relations}in the town are very good, there being few records of industrial action or unrest within the working communities. { Unemployment figures}for May 1985 show that in Stranraer,{931 males}and{ {431 females}are without employment.
